mapper.insert: insert into anime(title, description, cover_image, release_date, status, created_at, updated_at) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{coverImage}, #{releaseDate}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.update: select e.episode_number from anime a left join anime_episode e on e.anime_id = a.anime_id where a.anime_id = #{animeId}
mapper.select: select a.anime_id, a.title, a.description, a.cover_image, a.release_date, a.status, e.episode_id, e.episode_title, e.air_date, e.duration, e.episode_number, e.episode_image from anime a left join anime_episode e on e.anime_id = a.anime_id where a.anime_id = #{id}
